title: Peaky Blinders returns: the story so far - and everything you need to know before series 5 starts
text:
Period crime saga Peaky Blinders returns to our screens on Sunday 25 August and the sharp-dressed Brummie bootleggers have bagged a promotion.

Having built a devoted cult following on BBC Two, with ratings steadily building from 2m to more than 4m, writer Steven Knight’s stylish epic has been moved up to BBC One for its fifth series.

The new six-part run promises to be more incendiary and social history-packed than ever, so get up to speed with our tweed cap-clad briefing on the story so far. “By order of the Peaky Blinders”, as their saying goes – invariably with an expletive for emphasis.

Meet the Shelby family

In the aftermath of the First World War, we're introduced to Thomas Shelby (Cillian...
description: Period crime saga Peaky Blinders returns to our screens on Sunday 25 August and the sharp-dressed Brummie bootleggers have bagged a promotion.
